pkm.packageSourceSelection.label: Search in
pkm.noAppsInstalled.info1: The device is not connected to the ctrlX Store. No apps are installed on the device except for system apps.
pkm.noAppsInstalled.info2: Please download the installation files of the apps from our ctrlX Store to your PC or tablet. Then click on "Install from file", select the downloaded app files on your PC or tablet and confirm the installation.
pkm.noMatch.hint: No apps match the given search criteria
pkm.app.changeversion.serviceMode.toolti: To change the version of the app, switch to Service mode
pkm.coreUpgrade.text1: This will upgrade the ctrlX OS base system.
pkm.coreUpgrade.tooltip: Upgrades the ctrlX OS base system
pkm.uefiUpdate.text1: This will update the UEFI Bios of the device.
pkm.uefiUpdate.text2: This may take up to five minutes.
pkm.uefiUpdate.text3: Do not power off the device during the update!
pkm.serviceModeActiveHint: The device is currently in Service mode. Processing of real-time data is stopped. Switch to Operation mode to restart.
pkm.operationModeActiveHint: To manage apps (install, update, ...), switch to Service mode
pkm.operationStateActiveHint: The system is currently in the state {{state}}. To manage apps (install, update,...), switch to the state "Service" in the header.
pkm.operationModeDisabled.tooltip: Cannot switch to Operation mode, as an operation is running in the background. Please try again later.
pkm.serviceModeRequiredMessage.title: Service mode required
pkm.serviceStateRequiredMessage.title: "Service" state required
pkm.serviceModeRequiredMessage.descripti: This action requires the device to be in Service mode. Please switch to Service mode first.
pkm.serviceStateRequiredMessage.descript: For this action, the device has to be in the "Service" state. Please switch to the "Service" state first.
pkm.switchToServiceModeDialog.title: Switch to Service mode?
pkm.switchToServiceModeDialog.text: Processing real-time data is stopped. Ensure that all appliances are in safe state before proceeding (especially EtherCAT in Init)!
pkm.switchToOperationModeDialog.title: Switch to Operation mode?
pkm.switchToOperationModeDialog.text: Processing real-time data is started. Ensure that all appliances are in safe state before proceeding!
pkm.systemStateMigrationNotification.tex: "Operation" mode and "Service" mode are replaced by a switch in the header to toggle system states.
This switch is not visible if no real-time apps are installed.
The system states are irrelevant in that case.
Update all real-time apps (Motion, EtherCAT Master, PLC, PROFINET Device) before switching to "Operation" mode!
Then, switch to "Operation" mode to activate the new behaviour.
pkm.app.update.serviceMode.tooltip: To update the app, switch to Service mode
pkm.app.update.tooltip: Updates the app to this version. Data generated by this app is not lost.
pkm.app.uninstall.serviceMode.tooltip: To uninstall the app, switch to Service mode
pkm.app.uninstall.required.tooltip: This app is required to operate the system. Required apps cannot be uninstalled.
pkm.app.uninstall.tooltip: The app and its data will be removed from the system
pkm.app.install.serviceMode.tooltip: To install the app, switch to Service mode
pkm.app.install.successMsg: App "{{app}}" installed successfully. Refresh this page to see new functions.
pkm.app.disable.serviceMode.tooltip: To disable the app, switch to Service mode
pkm.app.disable.required.tooltip: This app is required to operate the system. Required apps cannot be disabled.
pkm.app.disable.tooltip: The app will be disabled, but not deleted from the system. It can be reenabled and updated any time. Generated data is not lost.
pkm.app.enable.serviceMode.tooltip: To enable the app, switch to Service mode
pkm.app.restart.serviceMode.tooltip: To restart the app, switch to Service mode
pkm.app.restart.success: Restart of the app "{{app}}" was successfully initiated
pkm.app.reinstall.tooltip: Reinstalls the app in this version. Data generated by this app is not lost.
pkm.app.reinstall.serviceMode.tooltip: To reinstall the app, switch to Service mode
pkm.app.downgrade.tooltip: Downgrades the app to this version. Data generated by this app is not lost.
pkm.app.downgrade.serviceMode.tooltip: To downgrade the app, switch to Service mode
pkm.app.missingPermissions.tooltip: You don't have the required permissions
pkm.app.delete.tooltip: Deletes this app version only from "{{repoName}}". This does not uninstall an already installed app.
pkm.app.list.header.name: Name
pkm.app.required.tooltip: The system requires this app. Therefore, it cannot be uninstalled or disabled. Updates are possible.
pkm.onlineStore.noAccess.tooltip: No access to the ctrlX Store. This is usually the case for ctrlX CORE virtual devices or after an image update. In the latter case, access is restored automatically within hours.
pkm.onlineStore.noConnection.tooltip: Cannot connect to the ctrlX Store. Is your device connected to the internet?
pkm.onlineStore.weakConnection.tooltip: Connection to the ctrlX Store is poor
pkm.onlineStore.goodConnection.tooltip: Connection to the ctrlX Store is good
pkm.settings.title: Settings
pkm.settings.unknownSourceSwitch.tooltip: For security reasons, your device settings currently only allow to install apps from a source known and approved by the Bosch Rexroth AG. You can change this setting at your own risk. It allows the installation of third-party apps.
pkm.settings.localStorageSwitch.tooltip: The app storage is a local storage on the device. Deactivating this app storage deletes all contained app files.
pkm.settings.notification.error: Failed to save settings on device
pkm.packageService.errorReconnectRequire: The updated app has to be reconnected again. Please refresh page!
pkm.packageService.errorUnknownSource: You tried to install an app from an unknown source, which is currently prohibited. You must explicitly allow this in {{errorUnknownSourceLink}}
pkm.packageService.firmwareUpdateHint: This app contains a firmware update! Ensure that the power supply remains until the planned reboot is completed and the device is available again.
pkm.packageService.safetyHint: This action might affect running processes. Ensure that all appliances are in safe state before proceeding.
pkm.packageService.restartHint: This action will cause the device to restart. You will be logged out immediately.
pkm.upload.failedCallout: {{num}} upload(s) failed. For details, see the list of uploads.
pkm.upload.state.failReason: Upload failed due to invalid header in response. Please try again.
pkm.upload.state.failReasonFileTooLarge: File is too large. If you are connected via Device Portal remote access, the maximum file size is 100 MB.
pkm.updateAll.title: Update all apps
pkm.updateAll.hint: These apps will be updated. Deselect an app to exclude it from the update.
pkm.updateAll.disabled.hint: This app is disabled and can thus not be updated
pkm.updateAll.noStoreConnection: No connection to the ctrlX Store. Only updates uploaded to the device can be shown.
pkm.updateAll.allErrors.title: Some apps failed to update
pkm.updateAll.restartCallout: This update will cause a restart!
pkm.updateAll.dependencyCallout: This update has a dependency mismatch.
pkm.batchUpload.restartCallout: This installation will cause a restart!
pkm.batchUpload.dependencyCallout: This installation has a dependency mismatch.
pkm.app.permissions.hint: The following permissions have been granted to this app:
pkm.app.licenses.required.tooltip: This license is required for this app
pkm.app.licenses.oneOfRequired.tooltip: One of these licenses is required for this app:
pkm.app.unlicensed.tooltip: Without a license, the app functionality can be limited
pkm.app.requiredLicenseMissing.tooltip: License for this app is missing
pkm.dependencies.title: Dependencies
pkm.dependencies.hint: These apps have to be installed for this app to work properly:
pkm.dependencies.callout: This installation has a dependency mismatch.
pkm.app.licenses.hint: These licenses can be purchased for this app:
pkm.app.licenses.noLicenseshint: No licenses can be purchased for this app
